Family Lifestyle With An Architectural Edge
The original period facade of ‘Kildare’ belies a thoroughly 21st century renovation. Description:
Elegance, Space And Convenience
Inspired by the graceful Edwardian era, this three bedroom, two bathroom villa is situated at the rear of a tranquil dual occupancy allotment. A charming lounge with box bay window flows to a fully appointed timber kitchen/meals area extending outwards for low maintenance entertaining. The automatic louvered pergola covers the entire courtyard, providing weather protection in adverse conditions and permitting sunshine to permeate otherwise. A vast master features walk-through wardrobe and ensuite while two further generous bedrooms (BIRs) share the main bathroom. Ample off street parking includes a remote controlled double garage (internal access) with ducted heating, evaporative air conditioning, ducted vacuum, a separate laundry, intercom and security alarm rounding off a solid package. The spacious interior and low maintenance upkeep will resonate with downsizers and investors while new buyers will appreciate the close proximity to North Essendon Village, Keilor Road and DFO shopping precincts plus Buckley Park. It's a rare find in one of the suburb's finest streets.

Edwardian Charm With A Modern Twist
Skillfully blending contemporary refinement with yesteryear charm and a focus on optimum family living, the opportunity has finally arrived to discover this classic, superbly presented,
four-bedroom, Edwardian weatherboard residence.
Iron lacework, decorative high ceilings and cornices, picture rails, timber finishes, and original cast iron fireplaces with mantel provide the romance of a bygone era while the new addition opts for understated modernity and discerning style.
The light-filled interior features: four spacious robed bedrooms (master with fully tiled ensuite), luxurious central bathroom complete with egg-shaped bathtub and walk-in shower, functional laundry, elegant powder room, separate formal sitting room, impressive open plan kitchen/meals/living domain opening to a generous decked alfresco area.
Promoting comfort, function and space, the premium kitchen is ideally positioned to service both indoor/outdoor living areas. Boasting: soft closing cabinetry, stone bench tops, large island bench, quality stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry.
Indoor/outdoor living is part of the picture. The family living zone, with its gas fireplace, floor to ceiling glass bifold doors leads directly to the covered alfresco deck which overlooks the secure, easy-care garden.
Desired extras include: 4-car garage with roof storage and rear dual street access, central heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, carpets, awnings, ceramic laundry sink, Tasmanian oak floorboards, quality light fittings and landscaped garden.
Enviably positioned in a top location, this gem is close to quality schools, Montgomery Park, public transport, Moonee Ponds shopping precinct, City link, Buckley St and Pascoe Vale Rd.
A showcase to excellence, style and entertaining, family living will always be a pleasure here!
